Get in Touch

We would love to hear from you, if you have anything you would like to discuss please do not hesitate to contact us.

If you have an question or issue regarding your waste collections please open a ticket by signing in to our online portal.

Open an issue regardign your waste


Alternativly if this is a general enquirey you can email us at contact@anenta.com.

Please be aware emails regarding your waste collections are not answered on this email address, you must open a ticket here.
